short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Pictures of our planet in every new tab, curated by communities of reddit

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
**** Note *****
The app lets you display your frequently visited websites over the image if you choose. Many people asked for this feature, so I added it as an option. All data stays on your computer and is not shared or stored by me.

Updates:

0.0.5 - Updated image request stability

0.0.1 - First build!
